metadata.title: CVE-2020-26247 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Nokogiri is a Rubygem providing HTML, XML, SAX, and Reader parsers withXPath and CSS selector support. In Nokogiri before version 1.11.0.rc4 thereis an XXE vulnerability. XML Schemas parsed by Nokogiri::XML::Schema aretrusted by default, allowing external resources to be accessed over thenetwork, potentially enabling XXE or SSRF attacks. This behavior is counterto the security policy followed by Nokogiri maintainers, which is to treatall input as untrusted by default whenever possible. This is fixed inNokogiri version 1.11.0.rc4.

criterions.comment: ruby-nokogiri: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
